# MusicBrainz Scripts

A collection of user scripts for [MusicBrainz](https://musicbrainz.org).

## Installation

To install a user script from this repository, you'll need a userscript manager like [Tampermonkey](https://www.tampermonkey.net/) or [Violentmonkey](https://violentmonkey.github.io/).

## Scripts

### Customizable Language Selector in Release/Work Editor

[![install](https://img.shields.io/badge/install-latest-3c9a40?style=for-the-badge&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDwvc3ZnPg%3D%3D&labelColor=lightyellow)](https://github.com/YoGo9/Scripts/raw/refs/heads/main/SetLanguageInReleaseEditor.user.js)

Adds customizable quick-select buttons for languages in MusicBrainz release editor instead of using the drop-down.

### Hide Buttons on ListenBrainz

[![install](https://img.shields.io/badge/install-latest-3c9a40?style=for-the-badge&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDwvc3ZnPg%3D%3D&labelColor=lightyellow)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/YoGo9/Scripts/refs/heads/main/Hide_Some_LBButtons.user.js)

Hides the Love, Hate, and Play buttons on ListenBrainz for a cleaner, distraction-free interface.

### Open All Harmony recording links

[![install](https://img.shields.io/badge/install-latest-3c9a40?style=for-the-badge&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDwvc3ZnPg%3D%3D&labelColor=lightyellow)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/YoGo9/Scripts/main/HarmonyOpenAllRecordings.user.js)

Adds a button to Harmony to open all recording links in new tabs with one click. This also has a function that can run with a bookmarklet, to submit all open tabs.

```javascript
javascript:(function(){   new BroadcastChannel('mb_edit_channel').postMessage('submit-edit'); })();
```

### Wikipedia to Wikidata Converter

[![install](https://img.shields.io/badge/install-latest-3c9a40?style=for-the-badge&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDwvc3ZnPg%3D%3D&labelColor=lightyellow)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/YoGo9/Scripts/main/wikipedia-to-wikidata.user.js)

This script converts Wikipedia links to their equivalent Wikidata entities in MusicBrainz.

### Prominent Wikidata Buttons on Wikipedia

[![install](https://img.shields.io/badge/install-latest-3c9a40?style=for-the-badge&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDxnPiA8L2c%2BIDwvc3ZnPg%3D%3D&labelColor=lightyellow)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/YoGo9/Scripts/main/wikipedia_wikidata_buttons.user.js)

Adds buttons to copy and visit the Wikidata entity for a Wikipedia page.


## MusicBrainz Wikipedia Checker Bookmarklet

Use this bookmarklet on Wikipedia category pages to check if artist links have a MusicBrainz ID or not.

```javascript
javascript:(()=>{fetch('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/YoGo9/Scripts/refs/heads/main/musicbrainz-checker-bookmarklet.js').then(r=>r.text()).then(eval);})()
```
